REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0960 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-19 0053

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN 40 MLN STG LATE ASSISTANCE
TEXT.BODY: The bank of England said it provided the money market with late assistance of around 40 mln stg. This brings the Bank's total help today to some 412 mln stg and compares with its forecast of a shortage in the sytem of around 400 mln stg. REUTER
